mapper.sql: attraction_id, name, location, description, score, latitude, longtitude, visited_count, want_count, recommend_count, cover, author_id, gmt_create
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from attraction
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into attraction (attraction_id, name, location, description, score, latitude, longtitude, visited_count, want_count, recommend_count, cover, author_id, gmt_create) values (#{attractionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longtitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{visitedCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wantCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recommendCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

attraction_id,
name,
location,
description,
score,
latitude,
longtitude,
visited_count,
want_count,
recommend_count,
cover,
author_id,

mapper.select:
select * from attraction where name like #{key} or location like '%' #{key} '%' or `description` like '%' #{key} '%' order by
nickname
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attractionship WHERE attraction_id=attraction.`attraction_id`)
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE attraction_id=attraction.`attraction_id`)
${order}
select * from attraction order by recommend_count desc
mapper.update:
update attraction
attraction_id = #{record.attractionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{record.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{record.score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude = #{record.latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
longtitude = #{record.longtitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
visited_count = #{record.visitedCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
want_count = #{record.wantCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recommend_count = #{record.recommendCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cover = #{record.cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author_id = #{record.authorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
